fr.sorbonne_u.components.plugins.asynccall

Interface AsyncCallI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAsyncCall, Server.Add, Server.Show

    public interface AsyncCallI
extends java.io.Serializable
    The interface AsyncCallI declares the methods to be implemented by an asynchronous call class.

    Description

    White-box Invariant

     invariant       true        // no invariant

    Black-box Invariant

     invariant       true        // no invariant

    Created on : 2023-03-09

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean calleeInfoSet()
      return true if the callee information are set.
      boolean callInfoSet()
      return true if the call information are set.
      void execute()
      execute the call on the runner, returning the result through the plug-in by the method sendResult.
      void sendResult(java.io.Serializable result)
      send the result to the caller through the plug-in.
      void setCalleeInfo(AbstractComponent server, AsyncCallServerPlugin plugin)
      set the server side references to be used to execute the call.
      void setCallInfo(java.lang.String callURI, java.lang.String receptionPortURI)
      set the client side information to be used to execute the call.

      • setCallInfo

        void setCallInfo(java.lang.String callURI,
                 java.lang.String receptionPortURI)
        set the client side information to be used to execute the call.

        Contract

         pre     callURI != null && callURI.length() > 0
 pre     receptionPortURI != null && receptionPortURI.length() > 0
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        callURI - URI of this call.
        receptionPortURI - URI of the result reception inbound port to which the result must be sent.

 post    plugin.receptionPortConnected(receptionPortURI)
